mapper.select: select * from applocation_group where group_no = #{groupNo} and group_accept='Y'
select * from applocation_group where group_no = #{groupNo} and group_accept='N'
mapper.update: update applocation_group SET group_accept ='Y' where group_no =#{groupNo} and member_id in (#{idList})
mapper.select: select group_pool from tb_group where group_no = #{groupNo}
mapper.delete: delete from applocation_group where group_no = #{groupNo} and group_accept='Y' and member_id = #{gwDeleteMember}
mapper.update: update applocation_group set role = #{memberRole} where group_no=#{groupNo} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, COUNT(*) count FROM todolist where tdl_checked ='Y' and tdl_update_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2021-12-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2021-12-30','YYYY-MM-DD') and group_no = #{groupNo} GROUP BY member_id

select TO_CHAR(tdl_create_date, 'MM') as monthlyData, count(*) as count from todolist where tdl_create_date >=TO_DATE('2021/06/01','YYYY-MM-DD') and tdl_create_date < TO_DATE('2022/01/01','YYYY-MM-DD') and group_no =#{groupNo} GROUP BY to_char(tdl_create_date, 'MM') order by monthlyData asc

select TO_CHAR(tdl_update_date, 'MM') as monthlyData, count(*) as count , COUNT(distinct member_id ) as memberCount from todolist where tdl_update_date >=TO_DATE('2021/06/01','YYYY-MM-DD') and tdl_update_date < TO_DATE('2022/01/01','YYYY-MM-DD') and group_no =#{groupNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(tdl_update_date, 'MM') order by monthlyData asc
